name: Flight Attendant Simulator (itch)
description:
ONLY TESTED ON THE OCULUS RIFT - MAY NOT WORK ON OTHER VR HEADSETS

This game is a beta release for a college project - it may be further developed and it does have a lot of bugs still present - none of which break the entire gameplay.

Play as a flight attendant aboard a private jet, hand out food to customers and make sure they are satisfied. In this fast paced VR experience, the wrong order could be a matter of life or death. Only time will tell if you’re up to the challenge.
